title: Stagflation - Ep 157
itunes:title: Stagflation - Ep 157
description:
Stagflation - low or negative economic growth caused by inflation - has likely come to America. While stagflation is far from good, and could cause a recession, there could be even bigger risks on the horizon. Fortunately, IMA portfolios are well positioned. Here's how.

You can read this article and part 1 in this link: https://contrarianedge.com/why-is-inflation-so-high-right-now-6-reasons/

Please read the following important disclosure: https://contrarianedge.com/diclosure/
